articles.author: Stephen Collinson
articles.title: The Republican Party infighting is driving America toward a government shutdown - CNN
articles.description: The Republican Party’s war on itself has turned its inoperative House majority into a “clown show” and a “dysfunction caucus” and is handing wins to the Chinese Communist Party – and that’s just what some of its own members say about it.
articles.content: The Republican Partys war on itself has turned its inoperative House majority into a clown show and a dysfunction caucus and is handing wins to the Chinese Communist Party and thats just what some of… [+9060 chars]
